body_html: What I meant to say is, once I get AMDGPU target to build, I can reference it inside xla code. Having xla code supporting the target and not able to link/build is unproductive use of time. I have gone through xla code and looks like a straight forward implementation for AMDGPU backend. I need help with getting AMDGPU target built right.

body: What I meant to say is, once I get AMDGPU target to build, I can reference it inside xla code. Having xla code supporting the target and not able to link/build is unproductive use of time. I have gone through xla code and looks like a straight forward implementation for AMDGPU backend. I need help with getting AMDGPU target built right.
